channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Some planks on this wooden footbridge are missing., 10th April
item.description:
Wooden footbridge on public footpath at the location indicated on the map.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gambles Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic during 7:30am to 8:30am, 10th April
item.description:
We need a traffic light here, cos traffic cannot get out during school run time and the queue buildup all the way to Pirton Lane (or worse). On coming vehicles do not stop on green to yellow light and lots of them even go with red light on.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: New crossing on corner, 10th April
item.description:
New crossing has temporary surface rasied kebs concrete poured on grass instead of soil Additional new droped kerb does.not have tactile paving which should be installed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New road entry, 10th April
item.description:
New entry to porter close has broken kerbs unleven tarmac
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Porter Close, Longlevens, Gloucester

item.title: Pathway blocked with soil piles, 10th April
item.description:
Someone has dredged the brook and re shaped the banks vertically and piled up soil covering the path

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Frog Furlong Lane, Down Hatherley, Tewkesbury
